scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=shared && npm run build --workspace=client && npm run build --workspace=server
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=client && npm run type-check --workspace=server
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=client && npm run lint --workspace=server
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=client && npm run clean --workspace=server && npm run clean --workspace=shared
scripts.deploy:frontend: aws s3 sync client/dist/ s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name my-agility-qs --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`FrontendBucketName`].OutputValue' --output text) --delete && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name my-agility-qs --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`CloudFrontDistributionId`].OutputValue' --output text) --paths '/*'
